description.narrative: The objective of this assignment is three-fold: i. To provide programme management services for all components of the K-EXPRO, namely: the Institutional Strengthening; Community Engagement; Transparency and Social Accountability; Private Sector Development; and Stakeholder Maps. ii. To support DFID Kenya to monitor and steer all the components of K-EXPRO, as well as coordinate interventions under K-EXPRO with other programmes in the extractives industry in the country and region by DFID and other development partners. iii. To build the capacity of local Kenyan institutions for sustainable economic development.

activity-date.narrative: End date revised via contract revision by DFID. Scope of project as originally intended was reduced and timeline changed. Implementation activities ended from 31 October 2018: project is in close-down / administrative wrap up through to end January 2019.

description.narrative: Original committed funds for project was £15m with expected end date of 28 Feb 2021. This represents revised total commitment following revision of scope of work by DFID, including revision of project end date to October 2018.
